nav.div: Southwest Allen County Schools » News » What's New » Information about COVID - 19

span.span: With guidance from the Allen County Department of Health (ACDH), Southwest Allen County Schools (SACS) has
this page to provide our community
a one-stop place for resources related to the COVID-19 outbreak.
